   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(ct_update_config_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -suite_defaults([{timetrap, {minutes, 10}}]).
   24: 
   25: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   26: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
   27: 
   28: -include("ct.hrl").
   29: 
   30: -define(now, ct_test_support:unique_timestamp()).
   31: 
   32: %% Test server callback functions
   33: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   34:     [{init_per_suite,?now}|Config].
   35: 
   36: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   37:     ok.
   38: 
   39: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   40:     [{init_per_testcase,?now}|Config].
   41: 
   42: end_per_testcase(test_case_timetrap_end_per_testcase_crash, _Config) ->
   43:     1/0, % invoke code crash
   44:     ok;
   45: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   46:     ok.
   47: 
   48: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   49:     [{init_per_group,?now}|Config].
   50: 
   51: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   52:     ok.
   53: 
   54: all() ->
   55:     [{group,group1}].
   56: 
   57: groups() ->
   58:     [{group1,[],[test_case,
   59:                  test_case_fail,
   60:                  test_case_timetrap,
   61:                  test_case_timetrap_end_per_testcase_crash,
   62:                  test_case_badmatch,
   63:                  test_case_spawn_crash]}].
   64: 
   65: test_case(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: test_case_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   69:     ct:fail(because_i_want_failure).
   70: 
   71: test_case_timetrap() ->
   72:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 1}}].
   73: 
   74: test_case_timetrap(_) ->
   75:     ct:sleep(infinity).
   76: 
   77: test_case_badmatch(_) ->
   78:     1 = 2.
   79: 
   80: %% test case is a slightly different flow, but at the moment behavior should be
   81: %% the same as for test_case_timetrap, as crash in end_per_testcase is catched
   82: %% in test_server module
   83: test_case_timetrap_end_per_testcase_crash() ->
   84:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 1}}].
   85: 
   86: test_case_timetrap_end_per_testcase_crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   87:     ct:sleep(infinity).
   88: 
   89: test_case_spawn_crash(_Config) ->
   90:     spawn_link(fun() -> error(bam) end),
   91:     ct:sleep(infinity).
